title: Windows Forms App (.NET) .NET5.0 and SkiaSharp throws Attempted to read or write protected memory.
body:
**Description**

I have built a Windows Forms App (.NET) using .NET 5.0  and SkiaSharp. It is throwing the error: “Message=Attempted to read or write protected memory. This is often an indication that other memory is corrupt.”

I submitted this problem to the .NET Core group, but they say it's not their problem (issue #4621). They wanted me to submit this problem to you guys.

**Code**

I have put my reproducible solution on GitHub at: https://github.com/CBrauer/TestSkia
I hope you guys can use this complete solution to fix the error.

**Environment**

Microsoft Windows 10 Enterprise, version 10.0,19042 Build 19042
Microsoft Visual Studio Professional 2019 Preview Version 16.9.0 Preview 1.0
.NET 5.0 

Charles
